item.title: Torch, OpenCV Installation and Test
item.description: OpenCV and Torch installation on Ubuntu 16.04; # Updates: sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get upgrade shutdown -r 0 sudo apt-get install git #Torch Installation #Run in terminal in order: git clone https://github.com/torch/distro.git ~/torch --recursive cd ~/torch; bash install-deps; ./install.sh source ~/.bashrc source ~/.profile #OpenCV Installation: sudo apt-get install cmake git libgtk2.0-dev pkg-config libavcodec-dev libavformat-dev libswscale-dev 2015-12-21 VERSION 3.1 OpenCV for Linux/Mac cd ~ wget https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/archive/3.1.0.zip --no-check-certificate unzip 3.1.0.zip cd opencv-3.
